lead_paragraph: Representative John Lewis, who led the House floor sit-in after the Orlando nightclub shootings, said Friday, “There’s no room in our society for violence.”

headline.main: Black Caucus Demands Congress Hold Gun Vote After Shootings
headline.print_headline: Black Caucus Members Demand Congress Act to Tighten Gun Laws
